label: 知行国
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: a province whose management and revenues were turned over to a member of the royal family, an elite courtier, or a religious institution that was known as the chigyōkokushu 知行国主
